# Chhotelal Kharwar

| birth_place  = Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India
| residence    =   Magrahi, Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh
| office       = Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha
| term_start   = 4 June 2024
| term_end     =
| constituency = Robertsganj
| predecessor  = Pakaudi Lal Kol
| successor    =
| occupation   = Agriculturist
| party        = Samajwadi Party
| spouse       =
| father       = Ramdhani
| mother       = Udasi Devi
| children     = 2 sons, 4 daughters
| website      =
| source       = https://loksabha.nic.in/Members/MemberBioprofile.aspx?mpsno=4859&lastls=16

Chhotelal Kharwar is a member of the Samajwadi Party. He won the 2014 Indian general elections from the Robertsganj constituency. He was a National Council member of the Bharatiya Janata Party from Sonbhadra.
